document.full_text: bernice king, the daughter of the late civil rights leader martin luther king jr., has left a suburban atlanta megachurch that has been at the center of a recent sex controversy, and plans to start her own ministry.
document.title: martin luther king's daughter leaves atlanta megachurch
lines_and_colors: bernice king, the daughter of the late civil rights leader martin luther king jr., has left a suburban atlanta megachurch that has been at the center of a recent sex controversy, and plans to start her own ministry.
